review: Definitely worth the price! I own both the Amazon Fire TV and Stick, as well as a Roku 2 XS and Apple TV. I have streamed on all these devices as well as various TV apps and Dvd apps etc, and I can state without doubt that both Amazon Fire devices are far superior to the rest. By superior, I'm referring to speed, audio and video quality etc... I highly recommend either device.
